name: WordPress Weather Widget
author: Yasir Adnan

sections.description:
WordPress Weather Widget.This plugin will show current day and next 4 days weather forecast.For more information,check out our blog!

Features:

  • Easy to setup.You don’t need any kind of Programming.After activation,check the widget section and enter the name of the city.
  • Well documented source code,you can easily customize the code
  • Easy location input
  • 4 days weather Forecast.
  • Our plugin included with custom icon.You can easily change the icon my replacing default icons on image folder.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory of your WordPress site,
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress,
  3. Visit the “Widget” on administration page to setup the widget on sidebar.
sections.faq:
Do I have to add custom images to my plugin?

Yes,you can.

Where can I report bugs, leave my feedback and get support?

I will answers your questions at twitter:
http://twitter.com/yasiradnan
